short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure crypto wallet for Web3 by HashKey

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redefines your experience with cryptocurrency storage and management. Designed as a non-custodial wallet, HashPass ensures that you remain in full control of your private keys and digital assets.

With a sleek, user-friendly browser extension interface, HashPass empowers users to manage multiple cryptocurrencies, interact with decentralized applications (dApps), and perform seamless transactionsâ€”all with industry-leading encryption and privacy safeguards.
